items.sentence: Tom said he wasn\'t able to do everything he\'d planned to do.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve heard anyone use that word.
What if what Tom does isn\'t good enough? What\'ll we do then?
Tom put the plate of sandwiches on the table in front of Mary.
Tom seems to be unable to interact normally with other people.
Tom wondered whether it would be hard to find a job in Boston.
We\'ll always have to be careful not to let this happen again.
You want to grow up to be big and strong like Tom, don\'t you?
I can\'t let Tom be put in prison for something he didn\'t do.
Mary is one of the girls that Tom is interested in talking to.
